Question.Subject: Courage the cowardly dog?
Question.Content: In the Episode "So in Louvre Are We Two", How many diffrent painting/scupltures are their and who are the artists? Link to video: http://www.livevideo.com/video/C8F5BBEC570C4A4DBC326F694D79942A/courage-the-cowardly-dog-so-.aspx

Answers.Answer: You should really ask this in the art section. Theyre probably just drawn for the show anyways.
